attributes.action: Apply compulsory road tax and insurance to cyclist.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Protect motorist involved in accidents with cyclist at cyclist error,

Protect parents from receiving large bills from the motorist in compensation for the road traffic accident the child has caused

Cyclist should no longer receive free use of Brittan’s roads as they now have dedicated cycle lanes and often cause hold up’s.

Cycle lanes often have indication of there whereabouts, which are often ignored. Cyclist should also pay for their street furniture, therefore be included in the road tax scheme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
